content:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/runner/entrypoint.py
DIR_STATE:["src/runner/__init__.py", "src/runner/entrypoint.py"]
Summary: Implemented a canonical Docker runner entrypoint that writes stable log/env/config artifacts, detects container-lost events with timestamps, and emits a run_summary.json for downstream evaluation.
